definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: John was too lazy to work and too proud to beg.
sentences.chinese: 约翰懒惰成性，不愿工作，又心高气傲，不肯乞讨。

sentences.english: But when he became powerful, his heart became proud.
I was so heart was lifted so near so ashamed to see my thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 我是如此心高气傲，这样羞耻让迩看到我的思想。

sentences.english: Because your beloved is so proud a person.
sentences.chinese: 因为你深爱的他是一个如此心高气傲的人。

definition: to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
full of youthful vigor (idiom)/in the prime of youth
